title: StubHub Files for IPO, Says Revenue Was Up 29% to $1.77 Billion in 2024
description: The secondary ticketing company had gross sales of $8.7 billion in 2024 and plans to use the IPO proceeds to pay down its $2.33 billion of long-term debt.
